globalHeaders.content-security-policy: default-src 'self' https: data: blob:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https:; img-src 'self' data: blob: https: *; font-src 'self' data: https:; connect-src 'self' https: wss:; media-src 'self' data: blob: https:; object-src 'none'; frame-ancestors 'self';
